# simpleson

Lightweight C++ JSON parser &amp; serializer that is C++98 compatible with no dependencies

## Original Repo

https://github.com/simplejson/simplejson

## Notes

- Kept only the core `json.h`/`json.cpp` sources used by the C++98 server.
- Removed examples, tests, IDE configs, and build metadata not needed here.
- Removed files not relevant to the project.
